metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3619 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: The DumpModeEncode function in tif_dumpmode.c in the bmp2tiff tool in LibTIFF 4.0.6 and earlier, when the "-c none" option is used, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read) via a crafted BMP image.

notes.Note: sbeattie> out of bounds read mdeslaur> upstream removed the bmp2tiff utility in 4.0.7 we will not be fixing this minor issue, marking as ignored

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
